marklogic.body: His 13 year old child gets a government paid vacation in a hot Spot in Mexico, along with 14 or her 8th grade graduating class friends -- plus 24 Secret service men, all on the American taxpayer. This while I had to pay $60 yesterday to fill up the tank of myÂ 10 year old, very modest car. Â And he has betrayed Israel again by leaking the newsÂ that they have made an agreement with Azerbaijan to use their air bases to land if they have to blow up the nuclear misslesÂ in Iran. Now Iran can be prepared.Â There goes the advantage of surprise. AmbassadorÂ John Bolton saysÂ Obama has torqued it up a notch against Israel by leaking this info. Why? Oh, why? would he take Iran's side over the only other fully fledged democracy in the Middle East, our friends, Israel? Could it be because he is a Muslim? The sooner we can get him out of power,Â the better it will be for the entire world.
